Description: REVOKE or DELEGATE
Callback URL to be used where the subscriber receives Notifications

List of all changed properties as IRIs after a ChangeRequest was successfully applied, e.g. [https://onerecord.iata.org/ns/cargo#volumetricWeight, https://onerecord.iata.org/ns/cargo#goodsDescription]
Error code is a numeric or alphanumeric code that can be used to determine the source of the error and why it occured.
Content types that the subscriber wants to receive in the notifications, e.g. application/ld+json
Organization Identifier that links the Holder of the data hosted on the ONE Record server
Data type of the field to update, must be a valid URI, e.g. http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#int
Organization Identifier of the Organization that should receive the delegated permissions
Reason for the request (optional)
LOGISTICS_OBJECT_CREATED, LOGISTICS_OBJECT_UPDATED, LOGISTICS_EVENT_RECEIVED, CHANGE_REQUEST_PENDING, CHANGE_REQUEST_ACCEPTED, CHANGE_REQUEST_REJECTED, CHANGE_REQUEST_FAILED

Expiry date as date time of the subscription information that supports caching but does not require the ONE Record client to store the datetime when the Subscription object was received, if not given: the information does not expire
Error object(s) if the processing was not successful
Error details
Link to the related LogisticsObject
Operation(s) to apply as PATCH on a Logistics Object
Contains a list links to the requestors Subscription objects with all subscription information
Latest revision of the Logistics Object. Starting with revision 0
Message that describes the error
PATCH object to modify
Operation objects must have exactly one op (operation) member, this value indicates which operation is to be performed. The value must be one of ADD or DELETE, all other values result in an error
Operations objects must have exactly one p, predicate, member. The value of this member must be an URI, e.g. https://onerecord.iata.org/ns/cargo#goodsDescription
GET or PATCH
Property of the object for which the error applies in IRI format, i.e. https://onerecord.iata.org/ns/cargo#volumetricWeight
Recorded change requests in the Audit Trail of a Logistics Object
Datetime when the request was created
Organization Identifier that represents the Organization that has requested
URI of the object where the error occurred
Revision number of the Logistics Object, starting with 0 for changing the initial revision of a Logistics Object
Operation objects MUST have exactly one "s", subject, member. The value of this member MUST be one of IRI or blank node.
Either a secret or API Key that ensures that only companies with this subscription information can POST to the subscriber callback endpoint
Flag specifying if the publisher should send the whole logistics object or not in the notification object
ONE Record API endpoint
PENDING, ACCEPTED or REJECTED
An array used to indicate the specific types of notifications that the subscriber desires to receive from the publisher. The subscriber is required to specify their preferences on a per-type basis
Organization Identifier of the subscribing Organization
Supported content types of the server, MUST contain at least application/ld+json
Optional list of supported encodings of the ONE Record server, e.g. gzip
Supported languages of the ONE Record API, minimum is en-US (American English)
Supported logistics object types on the server
Parties that receive the delegated rights
Identifiers of the logistics objects to which the access is requested
Short summary of the error

The Logistics Object type or specific Logistics Object to which the subscription belongs to e.g. https://onerecord.iata.org/ns/cargo#Piece or https://1r.example.com/7f01363f-0c6a-4414-be48-d3692e219b91
Specifies if the topic is a LogisticsObject type or a Logistics Object Identifier
Optional URI to the ChangeRequest that triggered a Notification if the eventType is one of CHANGE_REQUEST_ACCEPTED, CHANGE_REQUEST_REJECT, or CHANGE_REQUEST_FAILED
Updated value for the field
The type of cargo:LogisticsObject in the notification e.g. https://onerecord.iata.org/ns/cargo#Piece
Item that is contained in a collection
The number of total items contained in a collection
